cleaned_text: Naturopathy is a practice of alternative medicine that treats diseases without the use of drugs. Acupuncture is one of the natural therapies that a naturopathy doctor recommends to bring a balance between the universe and the human body. This therapy originated in China and is known to instigate the body's natural self-healing capacity. It is believed that the human body has 30 acupuncture points and between these points, there is constant energy flow. When these points are intervened, the human body gets ill or feels pain. At Nirvana Naturopathy & Retreat, we make use of acupuncture to treat a number of diseases and problems. We work with professional naturopathists at our naturopathy centre who are well-versed in the Chinese therapy of acupuncture. Some of the problems that we treat are given below. - Weight loss by reducing fat from the belly when thin needles are inserted in various points in the ear. - Acupuncture is great for overcoming fertility as this therapy helps to exert underlying pressure. - It helps to cure back pain, especially chronic lower back pain - Migraine headaches can be healed - Anxiety and depression can be cured What Are The Benefits Of Acupuncture? As one of the [top 10 naturopathy centres in India](https://www.nirvananaturopathy.com/), we recommend acupuncture to our guests who come to our retreat centre. This is mainly because of the following benefits: - Acupuncture helps in regulating the flow of the blood and energy within the body, and drains where there is excess while taking care of deficiencies - It helps to remove all kinds of blockages from the body without resorting to drugs or surgical methods - Acupuncture has a positive impact on the nervous system, cardiovascular system, endocrine and digestive systems, and boosts the immune system - The best way to deal with chronic pain anywhere in the body is acupuncture Nirvana Naturopathy & Retreat in Nashik is trusted by both Indians and international patients suffering from mental, physical or psychological imbalances. At our yoga and naturopathy centre, we use acupuncture in conjunction with other natural therapies to help people regain their health and well-being naturally. As our retreat centre is situated in the midst of nature, the serene and calm natural environment does half the work for us before we even begin the treatment.
